title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, December 28, 2019
description: It’s the birthday of humorist Sam Levenson (1911), who said, "Lead us not into temptation. Just tell us where it is; we'll find it."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of humorist Sam Levenson (1911), who said, "Lead us not into temptation. Just tell us where it is; we'll find it."
